title: CDC Advisers Recommend Pfizer, Moderna Covid-19 Vaccines Over J&J’s
sub_head: Rate of cases of rare blood-clotting condition associated with Johnson & Johnson’s shot is higher than initially thought
body:
U.S. vaccine advisers recommended adults take a Covid-19 vaccine from Pfizer Inc. or Moderna Inc. over Johnson & Johnson ’s after health authorities said the rate of a rare but serious blood-clotting condition was higher than previously detected.
The Advisory Committee on Immunization Practices voted 15 to 0 to make the recommendation Thursday after hearing updates from Centers for Disease Control and Prevention officials on reports of J&J vaccine recipients experiencing blood clots combined with low blood-platelet levels.
